thread.title: Man shot in Belmont Cragin
thread.title_full: Man shot in Belmont Cragin | Chicago Sun-Times

title: Man shot in Belmont Cragin
text:
A man was shot late Tuesday in the Belmont Cragin neighborhood on the Northwest Side.
The man, 26, was driving in the 5300 block of West Altgeld about 11:25 p.m. when he heard gunfire and felt pain, according to Chicago Police.
He suffered a graze wound to the side of the head and drove himself to Community First Medical Center, where he was listed in good condition, police said.
A police source said the man is a documented gang member.
